description: 轮播组件，支持自定义轮播索引样式及滑块宽度。**需要注意的是，如果正使用`fastclick`，需要为 touchstart 的 target 添加`needsclick`类**（详情戳这里），以规避`fastclick`逻辑与组件内部的手势冲突。（如果使用了`list`属性则无需额外添加）

descriptionTags.en: Carousel component, supports custom carousel index style and slider width. **Note that if you are using `fastclick`, you need to add a `needsclick` class to the touchstart target ** (click here for details) to avoid `fastclick` logic conflicts with gestures inside the component. (no need to add if `list` is set)
descriptionTags.name: 轮播图

tags.en: Custom classname

wrapStyle.description:
最外层容器自定义样式
@en Outermost container custom stylesheet
wrapStyle.name: wrapStyle

tags.en: Outermost container custom stylesheet

wrapStyle.descWithTags: 最外层容器自定义样式

style.description:
内层轮播容器自定义样式
@en Inner carousel container custom stylesheet
style.name: style

tags.en: Inner carousel container custom stylesheet

style.descWithTags: 内层轮播容器自定义样式

children.description:
轮播内部内容
@en Carousel internal content
children.name: children

tags.en: Carousel internal content

list.description:
轮播图片列表，省略子元素的简写，传入图片url数组，也可通过`text`指定图片底部的蒙层文字内容
@en Carousel image list, omit the shorthand of children elements, input the image url array, or specify the content of the masked text at the bottom of the image through `text`
list.name: list

tags.en: Carousel image list, omit the shorthand of children elements, input the image url array, or specify the content of the masked text at the bottom of the image through `text`

list.descWithTags: 轮播图片列表，省略子元素的简写，传入图片url数组，也可通过`text`指定图片底部的蒙层文字内容

animateDuration.description:
自动切换轮播滑块时，动画的执行时间(ms)
@en Animation duration(ms) when the carousel slider is automatically toggled,
animateDuration.name: animateDuration

tags.en: Animation duration(ms) when the carousel slider is automatically toggled,

animateDuration.descWithTags: 自动切换轮播滑块时，动画的执行时间(ms)

animateDurationSlide.description:
手动切换轮播滑块时，当手指释放后，动画的执行时间(ms)
@en Animation duration(ms) after the finger is released When manually switching the carousel slider
animateDurationSlide.name: animateDurationSlide

tags.en: Animation duration(ms) after the finger is released When manually switching the carousel slider

animateDurationSlide.descWithTags: 手动切换轮播滑块时，当手指释放后，动画的执行时间(ms)

loop.description:
是否开启循环轮播，当指定轮播滑块宽度时该属性不生效
@en Whether to enable circular rotation, it does not take effect when the slider width is specified
loop.name: loop

tags.en: Whether to enable circular rotation, it does not take effect when the slider width is specified

loop.descWithTags: 是否开启循环轮播，当指定轮播滑块宽度时该属性不生效

autoPlay.description:
是否开启自动播放
@en Whether to enable autoplay
autoPlay.name: autoPlay

tags.en: Whether to enable autoplay

autoPlayDirection.description:
自动播放方向
@en Direction when playing auto
autoPlayDirection.name: autoPlayDirection

tags.en: Direction when playing auto

swipeable.description:
是否响应手势滑动
@en Whether to respond to gesture swipe
swipeable.name: swipeable

tags.en: Whether to respond to gesture swipe

stayDuration.description:
开启自动播放时，每一个滑块的停留时间(ms)
@en The stay duration of each slider when autoplay is turned on
stayDuration.name: stayDuration

tags.en: The stay duration of each slider when autoplay is turned on

stayDuration.descWithTags: 开启自动播放时，每一个滑块的停留时间(ms)

boxWidth.description:
指定容器宽度，默认为基于父容器100%
@en Width of the box, the default value is 100% based on the parent container
boxWidth.name: boxWidth

tags.en: Width of the box, the default value is 100% based on the parent container

boxWidth.descWithTags: 指定容器宽度，默认为基于父容器100%

boxHeight.description:
指定容器高度，默认为自适应高度；当设置`vertical=true`时，该属性为必填
@en Height of the box. The property is required when vertical is true
boxHeight.name: boxHeight

tags.en: Height of the box. The property is required when vertical is true

boxHeight.descWithTags: 指定容器高度，默认为自适应高度；当设置`vertical=true`时，该属性为必填

baseBoxWidth.description:
指定初始容器宽度，常用于ssr首屏初始化，水平轮播时可用
@en Initial box width, commonly used for ssr first screen initialization, available when horizontal rotation
baseBoxWidth.name: baseBoxWidth

tags.en: Initial box width, commonly used for ssr first screen initialization, available when horizontal rotation

baseBoxWidth.descWithTags: 指定初始容器宽度，常用于ssr首屏初始化，水平轮播时可用

baseBoxHeight.description:
指定初始容器宽度，常用于ssr首屏初始化，垂直轮播时可用
@en Initial box height, commonly used for ssr first screen initialization, available when vertical rotation
baseBoxHeight.name: baseBoxHeight

tags.en: Initial box height, commonly used for ssr first screen initialization, available when vertical rotation

baseBoxHeight.descWithTags: 指定初始容器宽度，常用于ssr首屏初始化，垂直轮播时可用

width.description:
指定轮播滑块宽度，为0或不传时为默认的父容器宽度
@en Width of the carousel slider, the default value is parent container width if it is 0 or not input
width.name: width

tags.en: Width of the carousel slider, the default value is parent container width if it is 0 or not input

width.descWithTags: 指定轮播滑块宽度，为0或不传时为默认的父容器宽度

height.description:
指定轮播滑块高度，如不指定则为自适应高度
@en Height of the carousel slider, it will be adaptive if not input
height.name: height

tags.en: Height of the carousel slider, it will be adaptive if not input

height.descWithTags: 指定轮播滑块高度，如不指定则为自适应高度

initialIndex.description:
默认选中的滑块索引
@en Default selected slider index
initialIndex.name: initialIndex

tags.en: Default selected slider index

renderIndicator.description:
自定义轮播索引
@en Custom indicator
renderIndicator.name: renderIndicator

type.name: (currentIndex: number, total: number, lastIndex: number) => ReactNode

indicatorPos.description:
轮播索引位置
@en Position of the indicator
indicatorPos.name: indicatorPos

tags.en: Position of the indicator

indicatorVerticalPos.description:
垂直轮播索引横向位置
@en Horizontal position of the vertical indicator
indicatorVerticalPos.name: indicatorVerticalPos

tags.en: Horizontal position of the vertical indicator

indicatorVerticalPos.descWithTags: 垂直轮播索引横向位置

indicatorOutside.description:
轮播索引是否放轮播图外面
@en Whether the indicator is placed outside the carousel
indicatorOutside.name: indicatorOutside

tags.en: Whether the indicator is placed outside the carousel

indicatorOutside.descWithTags: 轮播索引是否放轮播图外面

showIndicator.description:
是否展示轮播索引
@en Whether to show the indicator
showIndicator.name: showIndicator

tags.en: Whether to show the indicator

hideSingleIndicator.description:
children 只有一个时隐藏轮播索引
@en Whether to hide the indicator if just one child
hideSingleIndicator.name: hideSingleIndicator

tags.en: Whether to hide the indicator if just one child

hideSingleIndicator.descWithTags: children 只有一个时隐藏轮播索引

indicatorType.description:
轮播索引样式类型
@en the style type of the indicator
indicatorType.name: indicatorType

tags.en: the style type of the indicator

indicatorClass.description:
轮播索引类名
@en Indicator classname
indicatorClass.name: indicatorClass

tags.en: Indicator classname

indicatorInverse.description:
轮播索引是否反色，默认根据索引是否放在外面决定
@en Whether the carousel indicator is inverse color, the default is determined according to whether the indicator is placed outside
indicatorInverse.name: indicatorInverse

tags.en: Whether the carousel indicator is inverse color, the default is determined according to whether the indicator is placed outside

indicatorInverse.descWithTags: 轮播索引是否反色，默认根据索引是否放在外面决定

spaceBetween.description:
子元素间距
@en Children elements spacing
spaceBetween.name: spaceBetween

tags.en: Children elements spacing

offsetBetween.description:
前后两端露出距离，设置值时不能循环轮播
@en The exposed distance of the front and rear. When the value is set, the carousel cannot be rotated.
offsetBetween.name: offsetBetween

tags.en: The exposed distance of the front and rear. When the value is set, the carousel cannot be rotated.

offsetBetween.descWithTags: 前后两端露出距离，设置值时不能循环轮播

currentIndex.description:
手动控制当前展示元素
@en Manually control the current display element
currentIndex.name: currentIndex

tags.en: Manually control the current display element

currentIndex.descWithTags: 手动控制当前展示元素

autoHeight.description:
容器高度自适应
@en Whether the container height is adaptive
autoHeight.name: autoHeight

tags.en: Whether the container height is adaptive

percentToChange.description:
滑动切换距离阈值(宽度比例)，范围为[0, 1]，如果该属性和`distanceToChange`属性均设置，则实际计算结果更大的生效
@en Sliding switching distance threshold (width ratio), the range is [0, 1]. If the property and the `distanceToChange` property are both set, the actual calculation result will take effect with a larger value.
percentToChange.name: percentToChange

tags.en: Sliding switching distance threshold (width ratio), the range is [0, 1]. If the property and the `distanceToChange` property are both set, the actual calculation result will take effect with a larger value.

percentToChange.descWithTags: 滑动切换距离阈值(宽度比例)，范围为[0, 1]，如果该属性和`distanceToChange`属性均设置，则实际计算结果更大的生效

distanceToChange.description:
滑动切换距离阈值(固定px宽度)，如果该属性和`percentToChange`属性均设置，则实际计算结果更大的生效
@en Sliding switching distance threshold (fixed px width), if both this property and the `percentToChange` property are set, the actual calculation result will take effect with a larger one
distanceToChange.name: distanceToChange

tags.en: Sliding switching distance threshold (fixed px width), if both this property and the `percentToChange` property are set, the actual calculation result will take effect with a larger one

distanceToChange.descWithTags: 滑动切换距离阈值(固定px宽度)，如果该属性和`percentToChange`属性均设置，则实际计算结果更大的生效

speedToChange.description:
滑动切换速度阈值(手指从按下到抬起之间的滑动速度，单位为px/s)，与滑动切换距离阈值同时设置时，满足其中一个即生效
@en The sliding switching speed threshold (the sliding speed of the finger from pressing to lifting, in px/s), when it is set at the same time as the sliding switching distance threshold, it will take effect if one of them is satisfied.
speedToChange.name: speedToChange

tags.en: The sliding switching speed threshold (the sliding speed of the finger from pressing to lifting, in px/s), when it is set at the same time as the sliding switching distance threshold, it will take effect if one of them is satisfied.

speedToChange.descWithTags: 滑动切换速度阈值(手指从按下到抬起之间的滑动速度，单位为px/s)，与滑动切换距离阈值同时设置时，满足其中一个即生效

vertical.description:
是否垂直轮播，设置后`boxHeight`属性必填
@en Whether to rotate vertically, the `boxHeight` property is required after setting
vertical.name: vertical

tags.en: Whether to rotate vertically, the `boxHeight` property is required after setting

vertical.descWithTags: 是否垂直轮播，设置后`boxHeight`属性必填

lazyloadCount.description:
只加载当前页相邻的n个内容，为0时会销毁所有相邻内容，不传则加载所有内容
@en Only load the n sliders adjacent to the current slider. If it is 0, all adjacent content will be destroyed. If not input, all sliders will be loaded.
lazyloadCount.name: lazyloadCount

tags.en: Only load the n sliders adjacent to the current slider. If it is 0, all adjacent content will be destroyed. If not input, all sliders will be loaded.

lazyloadCount.descWithTags: 只加载当前页相邻的n个内容，为0时会销毁所有相邻内容，不传则加载所有内容

stopTouchThreshold.description:
触发onTouchStopped的最小阈值
@en Minimum threshold to trigger onTouchStopped
stopTouchThreshold.name: stopTouchThreshold

tags.en: Minimum threshold to trigger onTouchStopped

bounceWhenNoLoop.description:
当不可循环时，是否开启滑动到最前或最后时的回弹效果
@en When it is not loopable, whether to enable the rebound effect when sliding to the front or the end
bounceWhenNoLoop.name: bounceWhenNoLoop

tags.en: When it is not loopable, whether to enable the rebound effect when sliding to the front or the end

bounceWhenNoLoop.descWithTags: 当不可循环时，是否开启滑动到最前或最后时的回弹效果

bounceDampRate.description:
当开启最前或最后时的回弹效果时的阻尼系数
@en The damping coefficient when the front or rear rebound effect is turned on
bounceDampRate.name: bounceDampRate

tags.en: The damping coefficient when the front or rear rebound effect is turned on

bounceDampRate.descWithTags: 当开启最前或最后时的回弹效果时的阻尼系数

inactiveScale.description:
非active的滑块的大小比例，[0, 1]的小数，设置后切换时将有放大效果
@en The size ratio of the inactive slider, the value range is [0, 1]. After setting, it will have a magnification effect when switching.
inactiveScale.name: inactiveScale

tags.en: The size ratio of the inactive slider, the value range is [0, 1]. After setting, it will have a magnification effect when switching.

inactiveScale.descWithTags: 非active的滑块的大小比例，[0, 1]的小数，设置后切换时将有放大效果

stopPropagation.description:
触摸事件是否需要 stopPropagation
@en Whether the touch event requires stopPropagation
stopPropagation.name: stopPropagation

tags.en: Whether the touch event requires stopPropagation

stopPropagation.descWithTags: 触摸事件是否需要 stopPropagation

fakeItem.description:
是否需要fake首尾item，用于offsetBetween不等于0时循环轮播的衔接
@en Whether to fake the first and last items, which is used for the connection of the circular rotation when the offsetBetween is not equal to 0
fakeItem.name: fakeItem

tags.en: Whether to fake the first and last items, which is used for the connection of the circular rotation when the offsetBetween is not equal to 0

fakeItem.descWithTags: 是否需要fake首尾item，用于offsetBetween不等于0时循环轮播的衔接

allowEndBlank.description:
滑动到最后时是否允许留白，仅在loop=false且设置了width时有效
@en Whether to allow white space when sliding to the end, only valid when loop=false and width is set
allowEndBlank.name: allowEndBlank

tags.en: Whether to allow white space when sliding to the end, only valid when loop=false and width is set

allowEndBlank.descWithTags: 滑动到最后时是否允许留白，仅在loop=false且设置了width时有效

iOSVisibleOptimize.description:
在iOS下是否需要在切屏时做DOM强刷优化，用于修复iOS息屏时自动播放的蜜汁渲染问题
@en Whether to do DOM forced refresh optimization when the screen is off under iOS, to fix the rendering problem of automatic playback when the iOS screen is off
iOSVisibleOptimize.name: iOSVisibleOptimize

tags.en: Whether to do DOM forced refresh optimization when the screen is off under iOS, to fix the rendering problem of automatic playback when the iOS screen is off

iOSVisibleOptimize.descWithTags: 在iOS下是否需要在切屏时做DOM强刷优化，用于修复iOS息屏时自动播放的蜜汁渲染问题

distanceProcessor.description:
自定义手指滑动跟手的距离计算方式，posDis表示touchmove的距离，wrapSize表示容器在滑动方向的尺寸，childSize表示滑块在滑动方向的尺寸
@en Customize the calculation method of the finger swipe distance. posDis - touchmove distance, wrapSize - container size in the sliding direction, childSize - slider size in the sliding direction
distanceProcessor.name: distanceProcessor

tags.en: Customize the calculation method of the finger swipe distance. posDis - touchmove distance, wrapSize - container size in the sliding direction, childSize - slider size in the sliding direction

distanceProcessor.descWithTags: 自定义手指滑动跟手的距离计算方式，posDis表示touchmove的距离，wrapSize表示容器在滑动方向的尺寸，childSize表示滑块在滑动方向的尺寸

type.name: (posDis: number, wrapSize: number, childSize: number) => number

getInnerScrollContainer.description:
组件内部的滚动容器，用于豁免滑动事件响应
@en The scroll container inside the component, used to exempt the sliding event response
getInnerScrollContainer.name: getInnerScrollContainer

tags.en: The scroll container inside the component, used to exempt the sliding event response

getInnerScrollContainer.descWithTags: 组件内部的滚动容器，用于豁免滑动事件响应

onTouchStopped.description:
当轮播不支持循环且滑到最前面或最后面，还想再滑动时触发
@en Triggered when the carousel does not support looping and slides to the front or back, but want to slide again

tags.en: Triggered when the carousel does not support looping and slides to the front or back, but want to slide again

onTouchStopped.descWithTags: 当轮播不支持循环且滑到最前面或最后面，还想再滑动时触发

onChange.description:
轮播滑块切换时触发

onAfterChange.description:
轮播滑块切换，动画完成后触发

onDistanceChange.description:
轮播左右滑动时回调，用于监听滑动距离以做滑动同步交互
@en Callback when the carousel slides left and right, used to monitor the sliding distance for sliding synchronization interaction

onPageVisibleChange.description:
自定义页面展示隐藏监听，默认在document监听visibilitychange事件，返回function用于在组件卸载时移除监听
@en Custom page visibility listener. By default, the visibilitychange event is monitored in the document. The return function is used to remove the listener when the component is unloaded.

tags.en: Custom page visibility listener. By default, the visibilitychange event is monitored in the document. The return function is used to remove the listener when the component is unloaded.

在某些条件下内部会禁用循环轮播，这里表示循环是否被禁用

changeIndex.name: changeIndex
changeIndex.description:
手动更新当前选中索引，rightNow 表示是否立刻跳转到目标索引，否则执行过渡动画到目标索引
@en Manually update the currently selected index, rightNow indicates whether to jump to the target index immediately, otherwise perform a transition animation to the target index

tags.en: Manually update the currently selected index, rightNow indicates whether to jump to the target index immediately, otherwise perform a transition animation to the target index

changeIndex.descWithTags: 手动更新当前选中索引，rightNow 表示是否立刻跳转到目标索引，否则执行过渡动画到目标索引
